name: Wake-Up Call: Blood Orange Citrus Cooler
description: While oranges, grapefruit, lemons, and limes can be found year round, the really interesting citrus—tangerines, tangelos and blood oranges—are at their very best right now. This citrus mix is bright and sunny, and honey softens the tartness from the blood orange juice while adding a distinct floral note.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all juices together to equal 3/4 of a cup (6 oz) juice. Gently whisk in honey till dissolved.
Pour over ice and top up with sparkling water for a cooler. For a citrusy toddy, add hot water and stir.
